# [Interview #127: Orbit Interview, Entry #12](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=127#12)

#### Orbit

Could you give us a little teaser of what is in store in
*Winter's Heart*
?

#### Robert Jordan

Nope. As they say on the Net, RAFO. That's 'Read And Find Out'.
